channel.title: Process Help
channel.description:
Hey guys, I'm new to this rsps stuff and would be glad if I could be helped. Could someone please tell me what I did wrong or haven't done yet, that would be alot of help. Thank you
I got my source and it is: Client: http://www.mediafire.com/?yyylojjbwzw
Server: http://www.mediafire.com/?dwmtykml2xl
After that I created my no-ip account and created a host. Then I changed my Environmental Values to:
CLASSPATH - CLASSPATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_23\bin;%CLASSPATH%; PATH - C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_23\bin;
Once I finished that I started Port Forwarding and I hope I did it correctly
[IMG]http://i186.photobucket.com/albums/x291/halo20000100/Port.png[/img]
Then I went into the client folder and looked for gui.java Hit ctrl+F and searched serverip Changed the ip to mine And saved and compiled
After that I tried to login and says server error. Any help please?

item.title: Process Help
item.dc:creator: @Kaex Kaex
item.description:
@Kaex wrote:

Heres my mini tutorial on setting up a server:

No-ip > Sign Up > Create host > Try use .org > example: Kaexrocks.no-ip.org

Portforward > Use whatever software preferably the actualy PF software to do so

Run your server > Make sure port is 43594 (or what port you desire) in both source and client files.

Your welcome.

Read full topic

@halo20000100 wrote:

C4ll3r:

True and did u changed your port a client.java to 43594?

I am using my real IP, not my no-ip and yes I did change my port to 43594.

item.title: Process Help
item.dc:creator: @Clawz_fury lare69
item.description:
@Clawz_fury wrote:

You don’t connect on your no-ip ip, you connect on 127.0.0.1

Read full topic

item.title: Process Help
item.dc:creator: @halo20000100 halo20000100
item.description:
@halo20000100 wrote:

Hey guys, I’m new to this rsps stuff and would be glad if I could be helped. Could someone please tell me what I did wrong or haven’t done yet, that would be alot of help. Thank you

I got my source and it is:
Client: http://www.mediafire.com/?yyylojjbwzw

Server: http://www.mediafire.com/?dwmtykml2xl

After that I created my no-ip account and created a host.
Then I changed my Environmental Values to:

CLASSPATH - CLASSPATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_23\bin;%CLASSPATH%;
PATH - C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_23\bin;

Once I finished that I started Port Forwarding and I hope I did it correctly

Then I went into the client folder and looked for gui.java
Hit ctrl+F and searched serverip
Changed the ip to mine
And saved and compiled

After that I tried to login and says server error. Any help please?

Read full topic
